info.title: nBold
info.description: Teams Template and Creation Automation with Channels, Files Template, Folder structure, Planner template with tasks; Governance Automation for Microsoft Teams.

post.description: This endpoint allows an admin or authorized user to approve a team request based on the provided team ID. The approval action will update the team status to approved.

parameters.name: approvalRequestId
parameters.description: The ID of the approval request you want to approve.

id.description: Impersonate the approver by specifying a User ID. If empty, you'll be automatically assigned as the approver.
id.title: ID

message.description: Message to be sent to the requester.

name.description: Overrides the team name defined by the requester.

description.description: Overrides the team description defined by the requester.

welcomeMessage.description: Overrides the welcome message defined by the requester.

201.description: Accepted - The response will also contain a Location header, which contains the location of the teamsAsyncOperation that was created to handle the approval of the team creation request.

400.description: Bad Request - Indicates that the server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).

innerError.description: JSON representation of the inner error (If available)

401.description: Unauthorized - Indicates that the request has not been applied because it lacks valid authentication credentials for the target resource (e.g., missing or invalid access token or API key...).

innerError.description: JSON representation of the inner error (If available)

402.description: Payment Required - Indicates that the request can not be processed as the client doesn't have a valid subscription.

innerError.description: JSON representation of the inner error (If available)

403.description: Forbidden - Indicates that the server understood the request but refuses to authorize it.

innerError.description: JSON representation of the inner error (If available)

404.description: Not Found - Indicates that the origin server did not find a current representation for the target resource or is not willing to disclose that one exists.

innerError.description: JSON representation of the inner error (If available)

429.description: Too Many Requests - Your request has been throttled as you've reached the maximum number of concurrent calls to our service. Look at the "Retry-After" header. See [API throttling guidance](https://docs.nbold.co/api#section/Rate-limits#nbold-api-throttling-guidance) article for more information.

innerError.description: JSON representation of the inner error (If available)

500.description: Internal Server Error - Indicates that the server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

innerError.description: JSON representation of the inner error (If available)

503.description: Service Unavailable - Indicates that the server is currently unable to handle the request due to a temporary overload or scheduled maintenance, which will likely be alleviated after some delay.

innerError.description: JSON representation of the inner error (If available)

default.description: Internal Server Error - Indicates that the server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

get.description: Get the teams collaboration templates accessible to the connected user filtered by the audience targeting rules.

200.description: OK - Returns a CatalogTemplates object (Collection of CatalogTemplate objects).

items.description: A collaboration template from your corporate catalog.

templateConfiguration.description: Information about the template and its related policies

enabled.description: Defines if the collaboration template is enabled or not.

requireApproval.description: Defines if the collaboration template requires an approval or not.

items.description: Object representing an approval team member.

members.description: Members of a permanent membership team.

items.description: Object representing a permanent member.

owners.description: Members of a permanent membership team.

items.description: Object representing a permanent member.

enabled.description: the collaboration template specific audiences or not.

clonedTeam.description: Properties of the source team that should be cloned.

teamId.description: The collaboration template source team ID.

teamName.description: The collaboration template source team name.

includeApps.description: Defines if apps should be cloned from the source team.

includeTabs.description: Defines if tabs should be cloned from the source team.

includeSettings.description: Defines if the team settings should be cloned from the source team.

includeChannels.description: Defines if channels should be cloned from the source team.

newTeam.description: Properties of the new team that will be created.

namingConvention.description: Defines the naming convention for the new team name.

emailConvention.description: Defines the naming convention for the email.

descriptionConvention.description: Defines the Description convention for the new team.

welcomeMessageConvention.description: Defines the welcome message convention for the new team.

defaultName.description: Defines the default team name. in the new team provisioning form.

defaultDescription.description: Defines the default team description. type: string

defaultWelcomeMessage.description: Defines the default team welcome message.

teamPrivacy.description: Defines the new team privacy level (public/private).

addRequesterAsTeamOwner.description: Defines if the requester of the new team.

parameters.name: teamArchivingOptions
parameters.description: In the request, you may optionally include the shouldSetSpoSiteReadOnlyForMembers parameter in a JSON body. This optional parameter defines whether to set permissions for team members to read-only on the SharePoint Online site associated with the team. Setting it to false or omitting the body altogether will result in this step being skipped.

shouldSetSpoSiteReadOnlyForMembers.title: Defines whether to set permissions for team members to read-only on the SharePoint Online site associated with the team
shouldSetSpoSiteReadOnlyForMembers.description: Defines whether to set permissions for team members to read-only on the SharePoint Online site associated with the team.

post.summary: Create a Team Based on a Collaboration Template
post.description: Create a team provisioning job based on a collaboration template. This template may include files, folders, Planner tasks, private channels...

parameters.name: TeamProvisioningRequest
parameters.description: A TeamProvisioningRequest object describing the job to execute.

schema.title: Team Provisioning Request
schema.description: A request to provision a team based on a template from your corporate catalog. See [https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/ProvisioningRequest](https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/ProvisioningRequest) for more information.

template.description: Template to be applied to the provisioned team

team.description: Properties of the team to be created

membership.description: Requested members and owners of the team to be provisioned

members.title: Teams Members
members.description: An array of UserIdentifier. See [https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/UserIdentifier](https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/UserIdentifier) for more information.

items.title: Team
items.description: Team member ID. See See [https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/UserIdentifier](https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/UserIdentifier) for more information.

owners.title: Team Owners
owners.description: An array of UserIdentifier. See [https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/UserIdentifier](https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/UserIdentifier) for more information.

items.title: Team
items.description: Team member ID. See See [https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/UserIdentifier](https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/UserIdentifier) for more information.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Additional metadata as a JSON object. See [https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/TeamProvisioningRequest](https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/TeamProvisioningRequest) for more information.

schema.description: A job that performs some tasks asynchronously.

id.description: The job ID, auto-generated at creation

items.description: A job logs entry.

data.description: The job data (for instance a `ProvisioningRequest` object)

post.summary: Create a Channel in a Team

parameters.name: Team Channel
parameters.description: A TeamChannelPayload object describing the channel to create.

schema.description: Payload of a Microsoft Teams team channel to be created/updated.

description.title: description
description.description: A brief description of the channel

membershipType.title: type membership
membershipType.description: The type of membership for the channel (e.g., standard or private)

schema.description: Response payload for a created Microsoft Teams channel.

description.description: A brief description of the channel

post.summary: Create a Tab in a Team Channel
post.description: Create a new tab in a team channel.

parameters.name: teamChannelTabPayload
parameters.description: A TeamChannelTabPayload object describing the channel to creat.

schema.title: Team Channel Tab Payload
schema.description: Payload of a Microsoft Teams team channel tab to be created/updated.

teamsApp@odata.bind.description: The OData bind URL for the Teams app to be associated with the tab

entityId.description: Unique identifier for the tab content

contentUrl.description: The URL that loads the tab content

websiteUrl.description: The website URL associated with the tab

removeUrl.description: The URL to remove/uninstall the tab

id.description: Team Channel Tab Teams App ID

externalId.description: Team Channel Tab Teams App External ID

displayName.description: Team Channel Tab Teams App Display Name

distributionMethod.description: Team Channel Tab Teams App Distribution Method

CatalogTemplates.title: Collaboration Templates
CatalogTemplates.description: A collection of collaboration templates from your corporate catalog. See [https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/CatalogTemplate](https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/CatalogTemplate) for more information.

items.title: Collaboration Template
items.description: A collaboration template from your corporate catalog. See [https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/CatalogTemplate](https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/CatalogTemplate) for more information.

templateConfiguration.description: Information about the template and its related policies

enabled.description: Defines if the collaboration template is enabled or not, and therefore available for end-users or not.

requireApproval.description: Defines if the collaboration template requires an approval or not.

approvalTeam.title: Approval Team Members
approvalTeam.description: Members of an approval team, as an array of ApprovalTeamMember. See [https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/ApprovalTeamMember](https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/ApprovalTeamMember) for more information.

items.title: Approval Team Member
items.description: Object representing an approval team member. See See [https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/ApprovalTeamMember](https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/ApprovalTeamMember) for more information.

members.title: Permanent Members
members.description: Members of a permanent membership team, as an array of PermanentMember. See [https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/PermanentMember](https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/PermanentMember) for more information.

items.title: Permanent Member
items.description: Object representing a permanent member. See See [https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/PermanentMember](https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/PermanentMember) for more information.

owners.title: Permanent Members
owners.description: Members of a permanent membership team, as an array of PermanentMember. See [https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/PermanentMember](https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/PermanentMember) for more information.

items.title: Permanent Member
items.description: Object representing a permanent member. See See [https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/PermanentMember](https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/PermanentMember) for more information.

enabled.description: Defines if the collaboration template should be restricted to specific audiences or not.

clonedTeam.description: Properties of the source team that should be cloned.

teamId.description: The collaboration template source team ID.

teamName.description: The collaboration template source team name.

includeApps.description: Defines if apps should be cloned from the source team.

includeTabs.description: Defines if tabs should be cloned from the source team.

includeSettings.description: Defines if the team settings should be cloned from the source team.

includeChannels.description: Defines if channels should be cloned from the source team.

includeMembers.description: Defines if membership (members and owners) should be cloned from the source team.

newTeam.description: Properties of the new team that will be created by the provisioning job.

namingConvention.description: Defines the naming convention for the new team name (Without the tags HTML representation).

emailConvention.description: Defines the naming convention for the email associated with the underlying group of the new team name (Without the tags HTML representation).

descriptionConvention.description: Defines the naming convention for the new team description (Without the tags HTML representation).

welcomeMessageConvention.description: Defines the naming convention for the new team welcome message (Without the tags HTML representation).

defaultName.description: Defines the default team name presented to end-users in the new team provisioning form.

defaultDescription.description: Defines the default team description presented to end-users in the new team provisioning form.

defaultWelcomeMessage.description: Defines the default team welcome message presented to end-users in the new team provisioning form.

teamPrivacy.description: Defines the new team privacy level (public/private).

addRequesterAsTeamOwner.description: Defines if the requester of the new team should be invited as a team owner or just as a team member.

items.title: Permanent Member
items.description: Object representing a permanent member. See See [https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/PermanentMember](https://docs.nbold.co/api/latest/reference/Models/PermanentMember) for more information.

enabled.description: Defines if the collaboration template should be restricted to specific audiences or not.

clonedTeam.description: Properties of the source team that should be cloned.

teamId.description: The collaboration template source team ID.

teamName.description: The collaboration template source team name.

includeApps.description: Defines if apps should be cloned from the source team.

includeTabs.description: Defines if tabs should be cloned from the source team.

includeSettings.description: Defines if the team settings should be cloned from the source team.

includeChannels.description: Defines if channels should be cloned from the source team.

includeMembers.description: Defines if membership (members and owners) should be cloned from the source team.

newTeam.description: Properties of the new team that will be created by the provisioning job.

namingConvention.description: Defines the naming convention for the new team name (Without the tags HTML representation).

emailConvention.description: Defines the naming convention for the email associated with the underlying group of the new team name (Without the tags HTML representation).

descriptionConvention.description: Defines the naming convention for the new team description (Without the tags HTML representation).

welcomeMessageConvention.description: Defines the naming convention for the new team welcome message (Without the tags HTML representation).

defaultName.description: Defines the default team name presented to end-users in the new team provisioning form.

defaultDescription.description: Defines the default team description presented to end-users in the new team provisioning form.

defaultWelcomeMessage.description: Defines the default team welcome message presented to end-users in the new team provisioning form.

teamPrivacy.description: Defines the new team privacy level (public/private).

addRequesterAsTeamOwner.description: Defines if the requester of the new team should be invited as a team owner or just as a team member.

innerError.description: JSON representation of the inner error (If available)

200.description: OK - Indicates that the request has succeeded.

201.description: Created - Indicates that the request has been fulfilled and has resulted in one or more new resources being created.

202.description: Accepted - Indicates that the request has been accepted for processing, but the processing has not been completed.

400.description: Bad Request - Indicates that the server cannot or will not process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).

innerError.description: JSON representation of the inner error (If available)

401.description: Unauthorized - Indicates that the request has not been applied because it lacks valid authentication credentials for the target resource (e.g., missing or invalid access token or API key...).

innerError.description: JSON representation of the inner error (If available)

402.description: Payment Required - Indicates that the request can not be processed as the client doesn't have a valid subscription.

innerError.description: JSON representation of the inner error (If available)

403.description: Forbidden - Indicates that the server understood the request but refuses to authorize it.

innerError.description: JSON representation of the inner error (If available)

404.description: Not Found - Indicates that the origin server did not find a current representation for the target resource or is not willing to disclose that one exists.

innerError.description: JSON representation of the inner error (If available)

429.description: Too Many Requests - Your request has been throttled as you've reached the maximum number of concurrent calls to our service. Look at the "Retry-After" header. See [API throttling guidance](https://docs.nbold.co/api#section/Rate-limits#nbold-api-throttling-guidance) article for more information.

innerError.description: JSON representation of the inner error (If available)

500.description: Internal Server Error - Indicates that the server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

innerError.description: JSON representation of the inner error (If available)

503.description: Service Unavailable - Indicates that the server is currently unable to handle the request due to a temporary overload or scheduled maintenance, which will likely be alleviated after some delay.

innerError.description: JSON representation of the inner error (If available)
